KEY PROJECTS 

• Voice of Customer Analytics – DELL INC. - Deployed automated regression models for impact Analysis and generated 
specific recommendations for multiple products across geography, segments and divisions. Worked on structured and 
unstructured data and provided insights on products performance over time as well as competition across brands.  

▪ Deployed700,000+ regression models to infer the most important factors driving customer satisfaction across 
products/divisions/regions. 

▪ Text Mining and Sentiment Analysis – qdap, sentimentR 

 
• Market Mix Optimization – Dr. Reddy’s Laboratories - Used Linear Programming to get optimized distribution of doctor 

specialties to target for drug promotion in branded and un-branded markets for a major Pharma company. Used various 
techniques such as ad stock, regression, lasso, ridge for incremental sales estimation modelling  

▪ Data wrangling  
▪ Market Mix modelling – adstock, diminishing returns 
▪ Regression modelling – Linear, Lasso, Ridge, bounded Coefficients 
▪ Optimization algorithms – Linear programming 

 

• Vendor Fraud Analytics – STAR TV - Developed routines for detecting possible fraudulent vendor activities. 
Identification of vendor information duplication, outlier pricing based on category and item pricing, duplicate invoicing 

and bank account fraud. 

▪ Identification of duplication in vendor details – Name, Address, PAN, Telephone 
▪ Develop routine checks for overpricing and duplicate invoicing   
▪ Key word matching to flag illegal payments  

▪ Bank transactions check for payments into employee accounts 

• Elections Analysis – Republic TV - Analysis of historical assembly election data. Identified party/candidate strongholds, 
voting margin patterns in constituencies and swinger/bellwether constituencies. Web Scrapping to get elections candidates 
historical data for a dashboard and perform EDA to get insightful stories.  
 

PROOF OF CONCEPTS & OTHER PROJECTS 

• Retail Sales Forecasting – Identify patterns in weekly sales data and forecast sales using internal and external factors. 
Developed an RShiny Dashboard with exploratory utility to understand the impact of macro-economic factors such as CPI, 
Unemployment, Fuel Price and Temperature at department level as well as store level. Identified actionable insights for 
stores and departments with potential for higher sales. Applied time series modelling techniques such as ARIMA, ARIMAX, 
SARIMA.  

▪ Data Imputation 
▪ Exploratory Data Analysis to identify Store wise and department wise patterns  
▪ Time Series Modelling – using historical prices as well as external factors  
▪ Built RShiny dashboard for Data Exploration and Results Analysis 

 
• Poverty Classification - Identification of households into poverty levels based on observable characteristics from Inter-

American Development Bank data. Techniques such as under sampling/oversampling done on an imbalanced class problem.

Project Details 
 
 
 
 
Security Awareness Dashboard 
 
This dashboard gives the director level and mid-level management a view of how people across the 
organization behaving to the educational phishing mails. 
 
In this dashboards we have shown the phishing click percentage on enterprise level as well as it can drilled 
down to different sub vertical levels. 
It also contains the information for repeat clickers in different verticals and sub verticals. 
 
 
App and Infra Dashboard 
 
This dashboard gives the director level and mid-level management a view findings. It demonstrates findings 
sliced by source, criticality, status, aging and risk level. 
 
In this dashboard we have created various graph based on given criteria on enterprise level as well as it can 
drilled down to different sub vertical levels 
 

 
Third Party Risk Management 

 
This dashboard showcases the third party data. It showcases the assessments based on status. It gives the 
director level and mid management a view of risk remediation and risk accepted. It will showcase the vendor 
details and corresponding data. 
 
 
 
Access Management Dashboard 
 
This dashboard was created to showcase different aspects of the associates with access on RED applications. 
The red applications can be hosted on SharePoint and Box.com 
 
This information was to be used by business for maintaining RED application compliance. 
 
 
 

 
Job Monitoring Dashboard 
 
In this project we have developed a dashboard which will show the daily trend of various jobs and their 
comparison with last runtime and median runtime. 
This dashboard also shows the various incidents open in our queue. This dashboard also help us to understand 
the monthly as well as quarterly trend of various jobs. 
 



 

 

                              

 
Diabetes Dashboard 
In this project we have developed a dashboard which show different aspects of diabetes patients. 
This dashboards show us the segregation by gender, age group, type of diabetes. 
 
This dashboard gives insight of different insurance plan availed by the patients and their enrollment period. 
It also shows us the different type of disease that accompanies the diabetes patients.
